Translations.Text: Koraa, ‘he manara sampradaya! Ma'i kerala tomalokara babe ejana suspasta satarkakarai’
eteke yisakale imana aniche arau satkarma karaiche te'omlokara babe ache ksama arau sanmanajanaka jiraika
arau yisakale amara ayatasamuhaka byartha karaa cesta karae, sihamte'i ha’ba jahannamara adhibasi

Arau ami tomara purbe yi raachula athaba nabi praerana karaicho, te'omlokara konoba'i yetiya (ahi bani) tilarata karaiche, tetiya'i cayatane te'omlokara tilaratata (kiba) niksepa karaiche, kintu cayatane yi niksepa karae allahe seya biduraita karae. Tara pichata allahe te'omra ayatasamuhaka supratisthita karae, arau allaha sarbajna, prajnamaya

E'ito e'i karane ye, cayatane yi praksipta karae, seya te'om sihamtara babe paraiksara bastu bana'i diye yisakalara antarata byadhi ache arau yisakalara antara ati kathora. Niscaya yalimasakala ghora biraodhitata lipta ache

Arau e'ito e'i babe'o ye, yisakalaka jnana diya haiche sihamte yena janiba parae ye, e'ito tomara pratipalakara taraphara paraa praeraita satya; phalata sihamte iyara oparata bisbasa sthapana karae arau sihamtara antara iyara prati binayaranata haya. Niscaya yisakale imana aniche allahe te'omlokaka sarala patha dekhuraaba
Arau yisakale kupharai karaiche sihamte iyara prati sandeha posana karaiye'i thakiba, sihamtara ocarata akasmikabharae kiyamata naha laike athaba sihamtara ocarata eta bandha dinara sasti naha laike
Se'idina kerala allaharae'i adhipatya; teraemi sihamtara majata bicara karaiba. Tara pichata yisakale imana aniche arau satkarma karaiche te'omloke niyamatapurna jannatata arasthana karaiba
Arau yisakale kupharai karaiche arau amara ayatasamuhaka asbikara karaiche, sihamtara babe'i ache lanchanadayaka sasti
